title: My Cousin in Milwaukee
text:
"My Cousin in Milwaukee" is a song composed by <a href="George%20Gershwin">George Gershwin</a> with lyrics by <a href="Ira%20Gershwin">Ira Gershwin</a>. It was introduced in their 1932 musical "<a href="Pardon%20My%20English">Pardon My English</a>". the song, indeed the show, was not a particular hit, although there's a number of vintage recordings of the tune.
Among them;
Notable recordings.
Arnetia Walker, complete score recoding of "Pardon My English", 1994 Roxbury/Electra/Nonesuch
